elements.title: Sarah Pike Conger (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Sarah Pike Conger (pictured) helped defend the international legations during the Boxer Rebellion by making sandbags and carrying supplies?

elements.title: Songbird Sings Legrand (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Regine Velasquez had to audition for composer Michel Legrand before collaborating in the concert Songbird Sings Legrand?

elements.title: Joseph-Alfred Archambeault (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Joseph-Alfred Archambeault threatened to excommunicate a writer who criticised the Catholic Church's opposition to the theory of evolution?

elements.title: New Galloway Town Hall (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that New Galloway Town Hall's clock mechanism was replaced in 1872 because the original was "utterly worthless as a time keeper"?

elements.title: Werner J. Dannhauser (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that political philosophy professor Werner J. Dannhauser was the basis for a character in a Saul Bellow novel?

elements.title: appraisal rights (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that shareholders who object to some transactions can use appraisal rights to make the company buy their shares?

elements.title: Everything We Need (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Kanye West recorded "Everything We Need" as a new version of his leaked track "The Storm"?

elements.title: Roman slave miners (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Roman slave miners would rather die than work in the horrible working conditions of the mines?
